full_text.0: Bezos urges Americans to hold off on making big-ticket purchases ahead of holidays https://t.co/oTNq1lYf6s
full_text.1: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos said he will give away the majority of his wealth during his lifetime, becoming the latest billionaire to pledge to donate much of his vast fortune. https://t.co/XZdjmSyRJ4
full_text.2: Bezos had been criticized for not signing the Giving Pledge, a campaign to encourage billionaires to donate the majority of their wealth through philanthropy. https://t.co/hiKX6Q3fHe
full_text.3: Billionaire Jeff Bezos says he plans to give away most of his fortune https://t.co/54d2FhKwZQ
full_text.4: Dolly Parton is the latest recipient of the Bezos Courage and Civility Award. https://t.co/SSIJU1sVKD
full_text.5: "I try to put my money where my heart is," Parton said. "I will do my best to do good things with this money." ❤ https://t.co/KqyKDycRyP
